ingredients.ingredient: ¾ fluid ounce vodka (such as Absolut®)
2 ½ teaspoons white sugar, or to taste

cookingTips: Fresh lemon juice yields superior flavor to bottled or concentrated versions
Chill shot glasses before pouring for optimal drink temperature
Suck on lemon wedge after shot to complete the classic experience
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help create a balanced sweet-tart shot. Discuss the importance of fresh lemon juice and proper proportions.
